events.name: Rest Day
events.description:
Rest day, no workout.
(Ref: FTP 314 W OUTDOOR)

events.name: High-Intensity Intervals (OUTDOOR)
events.description:
Warmup, 5x30s sprints, Z2 recovery, cooldown. Focus on power output.
(Ref: FTP 324 W OUTDOOR)

events.name: Recovery Spin (OUTDOOR)
events.description:
Easy spin, low cadence, focus on recovery.
(Ref: FTP 324 W OUTDOOR)

events.name: Tempo/SS Intervals (OUTDOOR)
events.description:
Tempo intervals, low cadence focus, include warmup and cooldown.
(Ref: FTP 324 W OUTDOOR)

events.name: Recovery Spin (OUTDOOR)
events.description:
Easy spin, low cadence, focus on recovery.
(Ref: FTP 324 W OUTDOOR)

events.name: Long Endurance Ride (INDOOR)
events.description:
4h endurance ride, maintain Z2, hydrate and fuel adequately.
(Ref: FTP 314 W INDOOR)

events.name: Threshold/SS Focus (OUTDOOR)
events.description:
Threshold intervals, focus on power, keep lower end of range.
(Ref: FTP 324 W OUTDOOR)
